stimulusHtml: Researchers conduct a study in which university students are asked to solve puzzles, a task that all students in the experiment report enjoying before the study. They split the students into two groups: a group that is paid money for doing the puzzles, and a group that is not. The researchers then observe how often students in each group complete puzzles during their break time when they are allowed to do whatever they want. Which of the following is the dependent variable for this study?
choicesHtml:
Whether or not the students receive money for doing puzzles

The university students who like to solve puzzles

The amount of money being paid to the participants

The type of puzzles the students had to solve
